channel.title: Random Question.. But - How Do I Add A "Website Icon"?
channel.description:
Hey all!
Do you know the little icons that aooear next to the address in your browser? Well if you do, I own my own website and I would like to have one of those! But I don't know how..Can anyone tell me how? Thank you.

item.title: Random Question.. But - How Do I Add A "Website Icon"?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

1 Pk3r 1:

Thank you, and sorry for the wrong section. But um, how do i get to the root of the directory in the webserver? Maybe this’ll help: I use webs.com (THIS IS NOT ADVERTISING)

That’s the standard Unix document root for mutli-user web servers:

/home/username/public_html

or, sometimes

/srv/www/htdocs

Read full topic

item.title: Random Question.. But - How Do I Add A "Website Icon"?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Wrong section, but I’ll answer. Make an image file and save it in ICO format as “favicon.ico”. Then place this in the root of the directory on the webserver.

Read full topic
